page.title: 09Droitwich-Housing Survey 2
page.content: {House Insulation Condition of house} double glazing 28 woodworm 4 wall insulation 13 dry rot 8 loft insulation 41 brick damage 1 fireproofing 1 condensation 6 {Central Heating }51 {Number of people living in house:} 1 occupant 2 4 occupants 23 2 " 16 5 " 8 3 " 13 6 " 4 {Size of garden:} none 4,small 27,medium 21,large 7 {Use of garden:} of the sample,25% used their gardens for a mixture of vegetable growing and ornamental/utility.75% for orn./util. only.Of those growing some vegetables the proportion of garden used varied from 1% to 75%.The average being 24%.
